Class PrescriptionManagement

Object
PrescriptionManagement
All Implemented Interfaces:
DispensingService, PendingManagement
public class PrescriptionManagement extends Object implements DispensingService, PendingManagement
The PrescriptionManagement class handles dispensing and approval of prescriptions.

This class implements both DispensingService and PendingManagement interfaces, enabling it to dispense items based on prescription requests and manage pending prescriptions for approval.

Prescription data is managed using dataProcessor, allowing the system to track, dispense, and approve prescriptions as needed.

Since:
2024-11-5
Version:
1.0
Author:
Sia Yi Zhen

  • Constructor Details

    • PrescriptionManagement

      public PrescriptionManagement(InventoryManagement inventoryManagement, dataReader dataReader, dataWriter dataWriter)
      Constructs a PrescriptionManagement instance that interacts with InventoryManagement for stock management, linking inventory controls with prescription processing.
      Parameters:
      inventoryManagement - The InventoryManagement instance used for managing inventory items.
      dataReader - DataReader instance to handle reading of data
      dataWriter - DataWriter instance to handle writing of data

  • Method Details

    • viewPendingItems

      public void viewPendingItems()
      Displays all pending prescriptions by reading from "AppointmentOutcomeRecord_List.csv".
      Specified by:
      viewPendingItems in interface PendingManagement

    • handleAllPending

      public void handleAllPending(String approvedBy)
      Processes and approves all pending prescriptions by dispensing the requested items if sufficient stock is available. Each prescription is marked as dispensed if processed.

      If the inventory does not have enough stock for a requested item, the dispensing is skipped for that item, and an insufficient stock message is displayed.

      Specified by:
      handleAllPending in interface PendingManagement
      Parameters:
      approvedBy - The name or ID of the individual responsible for approving the prescriptions.

    • dispenseItemByAppointmentID

      public void dispenseItemByAppointmentID(String appointmentID)
      Dispenses an item based on a unique appointment ID, updating its status to indicate that the item has been dispensed if sufficient stock is available.

      If the inventory does not have enough stock for the requested item, the dispensing is skipped, and an insufficient stock message is displayed.

      Specified by:
      dispenseItemByAppointmentID in interface DispensingService
      Parameters:
      appointmentID - The unique identifier for the appointment to dispense an item.

    • dispenseItemByMedicineName

      public boolean dispenseItemByMedicineName(String medicineName, int quantity)
      Dispenses a specified quantity of a medicine by its name. Reduces stock in the inventory if sufficient quantity is available, and checks if the stock is low after dispensing.

      If there is not enough stock for the requested quantity, the method does not dispense any quantity and returns false.

      Specified by:
      dispenseItemByMedicineName in interface DispensingService
      Parameters:
      medicineName - The name of the medicine to dispense.
      quantity - The quantity of the medicine to dispense.
      Returns:
      true if the item was successfully dispensed; false if there was insufficient stock.

    • showAllAppointments

      public void showAllAppointments()
      Displays all records from "AppointmentOutcomeRecord_List.csv", showing the outcome of each appointment.
